message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone like you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,100,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  While I'm confident in the value this product brings, I could meet you halfway from our previous offers. Would $1,125,000 be agreeable?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,100,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
